'''Decree of the Deeps''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" [[Neuvillette]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|Decree of the Deeps}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Tome of the Eternal Flow]], a weapon tailored to Neuvillette's gameplay mechanics.
